knimeNode.name: Label Transformer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Transforms a label using the given expression. Attention: Only the Labeling Name is transformed!

intro.p: This nodes evaluates the given expression by concatenating the defined variables or a self-defined string. The result is a string-based labeling, containing the new, modified labels, resulting from the expression.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Available String input columns. Click any column name to include the value in the expression text field.
